Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav hit a six that sailed into the three Ws stand and held his pose
Jasprit Bumrah struck off his second ball against Afghanistan and finished with 3 for 7
Pre-Game Insights: India have ditched the safety-first approach and are batting more aggressively
Suryakumar Yadav was nervous but focused on keeping the intent up
India's best T20 batter mans the No. 4 position now
Post-Match Reflections: India do not want to fall into the same traps as before. This World Cup, they're going to bat like they have a full ten wickets to spare
Miscellaneous Highlights: Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma did not play a single T20I between the end of the previous World Cup in 2022 and January this year
Kuldeep Yadav, back in the XI to exploit favourable conditions, picked up 2 for 32
Axar Patel began with a wicket-maiden in the powerplay
Ravindra Jadeja had a good run out as well
Arshdeep recovered from a two-over spell for 22 runs to almost pick up a hat-trick in the dying moments
